name: Adsvault
overview:
Adsvault is Pay Per Click advertising agency for advertisers and publishers. Both advertisers and publishers can sign up for an account to increase sales/traffic and to monetize websites or blogs.

Advertisers can create PPC advertising campaigns and invest a minimum of $10 dollars and decide how much they want to spend on an advert each day. There are lots of ad sizes available and it is very easy to use. Ads are displayed on publisher websites and Adsvault partner websites. Blogsplash.Org has partnered up with Adsvault; ads are displayed on this blogging platform also and gives bloggers a chance to earn revenue.

Publsihers can register with Blogsplash.Org and create a free blog and earn revenue with Adsvault on their blog and also other websites and blogs. The interface is easy to use and they can create ad blocks that match the look and feel of their websites.
